refnamediv.refpurpose: Calculate the cepstrum of a pvs input, optionally liftering coefficients.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: icoefs -- the number of retained coefficients in the cepstrum output. By default, no coefficients are liftered.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: keps[] -- the cepstrum output, an array of size N/2+1, where N is equivalent to the FFT size of the input fsig.
